HelpIntro.Intro: {dac7ae}1. After killing BOSS, special items will be auctioned in the Golden League
{dac7ae}2. After auction successful {17e43e}will be auctioned to the participating players (reward depends on the amount of damage done)
{dac7ae}3. If there is no auctioneer Auction items will be mailed to {17e43e} to the player who has the maximum damage. {-}
{dac7ae}4. If the bid or bidder is too small (each player will receive 1 diamond), no prize
